name: Walking Arsenal
text:
This model can spike at any time during its activation to use one of the following munitions:
Hollowphage Rounds - The first ranged weapon attack made by each model in this squad gains Corrosion this activation.
Null Detonators - In addition to their other weapons, models in this squad gain Null Detonators this activation.
Seeker Ammunition - Ranged attacks made by models in this squad ignore cover this activation.
